text: thumb|220px|A carved wooden beam from Loulan in the British Museum, 3rd-4th century. Loulan, also called Kror√§n or Kroraina, was an ancient kingdom. It was based on an important oasis city on the Silk Road. It was known in the 2nd century BC on the northeastern edge of the Lop Desert. Loulan is now in Xinjiang, China. The oasis has now dried up. Category:History of China
title: Loulan Kingdom
